_header: Behold now man what thou shalt be
Note:
Cf. Walther (1963)
XWalther, Hans. Proverbia sententiaque latinitatis medii aevi. 6 vols. Göttingen, 1963-69, no. 33309f.
_description: On the vanity of life — one quatrain based on ‘Vide, qualis eris, [qui] mundi guadia queris’, which is written to the left

NLS18721.Transcription:
Behold nou man quat þu salt beÞat al þis werd nou
                    drawith to þeA foul caroniȝe on þe to seÞat
                    schinest nou so fair in ble

Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
